overview: THE FIFTH GENERATION is an experimental dark comedy by Hugo Santa Cruz. A surreal exploration of the dynamics at play amongst five radicalised environmentalists and the motivations that lead them to carry out the kidnapping of a major UK political figure in order to achieve their masterplan. Â  A conceptually structured intuitive foray into the narrative boundaries of the cinematic medium by way of a 25 page script with 5 lead characters only. Shot 5 times, in 5 days. Each time, each actor plays a different character. Each time, the shooting style varies: general, super 8, theatre, multilingual, & documentary.
tagline: What do we want? Climate payback!
title: The Fifth Generation
